newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar shrugs off torpor in PM, ends firmer.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar shrugs off torpor in PM, ends firmer.

text.p: LIFFE sugar popped up in late trading on Wednesday and finished the day at its highs, traders said.
Traders said New York-led speculative buying helped to inject some life into the otherwise dull market in the afternoon.
Front month August settled $1.10 firmer at $321.30, while October was $1.30 higher at $310.40.
August dominated volume with 1,866 of a total 3,795 lots.
In Paris, August was up $0.70 at $320.70 and October was $0.10 firmer at $309.10.
